name: @ibgib/encrypt-gib
description: Experimental (weak?) encryption based on cryptographic hashing as the only primitive.

scripts.man:test: echo 'NOTICE !!!! executing full stress test. also see man:test:quick' !!!! NOTICE
scripts.test:both: npm run build:test && npm run test:node:nobuild && npm run test:browser:nobuild
scripts.man:test:both: echo 'use this if you want to test respec in both node and browser contexts'
scripts.man:test:quick: echo 'use this if you want to build+test QUICK respec tests (much MUCH shorter than full test)'
scripts.man:test:node: echo 'use this if you want to build+test in node'
scripts.man:test:node:nobuild: echo 'use this if you want to test in node but its already built'
scripts.man:test:node:quick: echo 'use this if you want to build+test QUICK respec tests in node'
scripts.man:test:node:quick:nobuild: echo 'use this if you want to execute QUICK respec tests in node but its already built'
scripts.man:test:browser: echo 'use this if you want to build+test only the browser context'
scripts.man:test:browser:nobuild: echo 'use this if you want to test only the browser context but its already built'
scripts.test:browser:serve: npm run build:test && echo "not implemented yet"
scripts.man:test:browser:serve: echo 'use this if you want to build+test in the browser and don't want the browser to close when your done. (i.e. you're debugging)'
scripts.man:test:browser:serve:nobuild: echo 'use this if you are troubleshooting existing dist output and don't want to overwrite those files. (and you're debugging in the browser)'
scripts.prepare:publish: npm run clean && npm version patch && npm run build && npm run pack
scripts.man:prepare:publish: echo 'use this to patch > build > pack for publishing to npm repo'

author: William Raiford
